Package com.cmput301w18t26.taskit

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bid
    Represents a single bid.
    BidActivity
    Retrieves the info a user has entered when the user clicks the confirm bid button Sets the details of the bid and creates a new Bid object
    BidList
    Represents a list of bids.
    BidListActivity
    Shows the list of bids for the task clicked on Creates dialog that allows the user to accept or decline a bid If the bid is declined, it is deleted from the database
    BidListAdapter
    Created by Brady on 2018-03-10.
    BuildConfig  
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    GenFakeData
    Created by kevingordon on 2018-03-08.
    HomeActivity
    contains the buttons for the page after login "homepage", passes a different intent depending on the button clicked so a different list is displayed in ListActivity
    ListActivity
    sets the homepage view once the user logs in, contains method to refresh the page when the page is swiped down.
    LoginActivity
    contains the activity that controls logging in and going to home page, and registering a new user Created by kevingordon on 2018-02-26.
    MainActivity
    Created by haozhengqin on 2018/3/10.
    MapActivity
    Activity for starting Google Maps and handling the interactions with it will likely be refactored into multiple classes in the future so this is View class and the controller functionality can be separated out
    MockBid
    Created by kevingordon on 2018-03-04.
    MockTask
    Created by kevingordon on 2018-03-04.
    MockUser
    Created by kevingordon on 2018-03-04.
    Photo
    Represents a single Photo.
    PhotoList
    Represents a list of photos.

    ReviewDescriptionActivity
    Created by colin on 2018-04-01.
    Task
    Represents a single task.
    TaskActivity
    Contains methods for creating, editing and deleting tasks.
    TaskAdapter  
    TaskItData
    Holds the data for the entire application.
    TaskItFile
    Handles file I/O for the application - read/write {bids, tasks, users}
    TaskItServer
    Handles server I/O for the application - push/pull {bids, tasks, users}
    TaskItServer.addBidJob  
    TaskItServer.addPhotoJob  
    TaskItServer.addTaskJob  
    TaskItServer.addUserJob
    ---- Add {user, task, bid} methods ---- These create async tasks and will add a collection of the corresponding object to the server.
    TaskItServer.deleteBidJob  
    TaskItServer.deletePhotoJob  
    TaskItServer.deleteTaskJob  
    TaskItServer.deleteUserJob
    ---- Delete {user, task, bid} methods ---- These create async tasks and will delete a collection of the corresponding object from the server.
    TaskItServer.getBidJob  
    TaskItServer.getPhotoJob  
    TaskItServer.getTaskJob  
    TaskItServer.getUserJob
    ---- Get {user, task, bid} methods ---- These create async tasks and will retrieve their corresponding objects from the server, returning them in their corresponding model class.
    TaskItServer.setupServerJob
    Setup the server.
    TaskItServer.teardownServerJob
    Delete the index for this application from the elastic search server.
    TaskItSync
    Handles synchronization of filesystem and server Get the data from the filesystem (local) Get the data from the server (remote) Compare.
    TaskList
    Represents a list of bids.
    User
    Represents a single User.
    UserActivity
    Creates a new user or modifies user details.
    UserList
    Represents a list of users.
